Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute at 100th/Paxton
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Yates, 99th, Van Vissingen Road due to, street blockage near 100th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Yates, 99th, Van Vissingen Road due to, street blockage near 100th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.
